tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (S (VP (VBG Trying) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB stay)))))) (VP (VBN focused) (PP (IN on) (NP (NP (DT the) (JJ true) (NN meaning)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NNP Christmas)))))) (. .)))
